column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Tuesday March 13 at 4:00 p.m.

column4: Outbound Leestown Rd shutdown at New Circle Rd.  One inbound lane blocked at Opportunity Way.
Non injury collision involving two semis at Opportunity Way.
All outbound Leestown Rd traffic diverted to the outer loop of New Circle Rd until further notice.
Inbound Alumni Dr at Tates Creek Rd
